description:
The charming butterfly Hilaria has flown into the palace!

With a glimpse into the future ahead of an important decision, she becomes an Emperor’s concubine to save her motherland. She’s so extraordinary there was never even any hesitation!

“How long are you going to keep me looking up?” From maids to Empresses, no one can help but to falter in her presence!

“Cute… The Empress is lovely… delicious even.” – Ebenezer, the desirable Emperor who pretends to be kind with a smile – well he’s just a bonus.

From there, Hilaria’s dangerous journey begins.

“Shall we have a cup of tea?” I’ll take care of you.”

The sweet trust and romance that blooms in the Imperial Castle is full of intrigue!>
